titleStmt.title: An excellent receipt to make a compleat common-wealth-oleo, or (if you please) a new senate fitted to the English-man's palate
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Prynne by Wing but not included in An exact catalogue of all printed books and papers ... by William Prynne, 1660, or in the ms. additions made by William Herbert to his copy of the catalogue (now in MH-H)--MH-H.
A satire in the form of a medical prescription.
Item at reel 222:22 identified as Wing P3951 (entry cancelled).
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
